title: Eric Dane, star of Grey's Anatomy and Euphoria, dies aged 53
desc: The star was best known for his role as Dr Mark Sloan in long-running medical drama Grey's Anatomy, and as the patriarch of the Jacobs family in teen hit Euphoria.

title: Britain’s curlers guarantee a medal as Mouat holds his nerve against Swiss
desc: Bruce Mouat’s men’s team edged past Switzerland 8-5 in the final end and will now go for gold in Saturday’s final against Canada

title: Crew member dies after fire on cruise ship en route to Singapore; all 224 passengers safe
desc: SINGAPORE: A crew member has been reported dead after a fire on a cruise en route to Singapore early on Friday (Feb 20).

title: Troops for Gaza and money top agenda as Trump’s Board of Peace meets
desc: US president vows multinational force and billions of dollars as autocrats and rightwing allies gather in DC

desc:
Five southern African countries plan one-stop border posts
Ministers review PPP financing model with DP World, AfCFTA

title: Healthcare institutions widen youth volunteers’ roles with para-clinical training
desc: Hospitals are also turning their attention to elderly volunteers, who offer greater weekday availability and can communicate with patients in various dialects.

title: James Harden leads the Cavs to another one-sided win
desc: The Cavs came away with a stress-free 112-84 victory.

title: Trump, Prabowo finalise trade deal slashing tariff rate to 19%
desc: President Donald Trump and Indonesian President Prabowo Subianto finalised a trade agreement Thursday, ending months of uncertainty with an accord that’s expected to lower US tariffs and see Jakarta facilitate the purchase of an estimated US$33 billion (RM129.05 billion) in American goods.
